Class GameIcons

java.lang.Object
edu.uw.tcss.game.gui.util.GameIcons
public final class GameIcons extends Object
Utility class for creating game control icons. Provides factory methods for generating directional arrow icons and new game icons.
Version:
Autumn 2025
Author:
Charles Bryan

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private static final int
    ICON_SIZE
    The size of icons in pixels.
    private static final int
    MID
    The midpoint of the icon.
    private static final int
    OFFSET
    The offset from center for arrow drawing.
    private static final float
    STROKE_WIDTH
    Stroke width for icon graphics.

    • createArrowIcon

      public static ImageIcon createArrowIcon(GameControls.Move theDirection)
      Creates an arrow icon pointing in the specified direction.
      Parameters:
      theDirection - the direction for the arrow
      Returns:
      an ImageIcon containing the arrow

    • setupGraphics

      private static void setupGraphics(Graphics2D theG2d)
      Configures graphics context with antialiasing and drawing properties.
      Parameters:
      theG2d - the graphics context to configure

    • drawArrow

      private static void drawArrow(Graphics2D theG2d, GameControls.Move theDirection)
      Draws an arrow in the specified direction.
      Parameters:
      theG2d - the graphics context
      theDirection - the direction to draw
